title: Investor Buys $6 Billion of Colombian Peso Bonds
description: Colombia sold the equivalent of $6 billion in peso bonds directly to a foreign investor, the latest in a set of unprecedented debt management operations seeking to meet the nation’s financial needs and reduce its swelling debt levels.
content: Colombia sold the equivalent of $6 billion in peso bonds directly to a foreign investor, the latest in a set of unprecedented debt management operations seeking to meet the nation’s financial needs and reduce its swelling debt levels.
